message: This may have been mentioned before, sorry if so. I was just looking through a topic and saw someone with a message that I wanted to star. Others had starred it, so it was already yellow, but this caused me to pause for a bit (since there were a lot of names attached) to try to determine whether or not *I* had been one of those people who starred it.
Might keep the star unfilled unless you are the one who has starred it.
Or perhaps use different colors depending on who star'd the answer :-)
